main.name: Hi! I'm Donat Natthanan
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I am a person who love to learn new things and always challenge myself. I believed that new problems lead to new knowledge and endless progression.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.school: King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi (KMUTT)-JGSEE
education.degree: Masters in Energy Technology and Management (Full Scholarship: GPA 3.81)
education.description: Research Interested : Application of deep learning techniques to forecast the tilted solar radiation in tropical climate of Thailand. This study use python for data manipulation and TensorFlow was used for data modelling.

education.school: King Mongkut's University of Technology Thonburi (KMUTT)
education.degree: Bachelor in Automation Engineering (Second Class Honors: GPA 3.43)
education.description: Final Project : Automatic Water Quality Control and Monitor for Shrimp Farming via Low Energy Wireless Communication. Google Cloud Platform was used in backend development. Design and develop WebApp, UX/UI design, LIFF (LINE), Dialogflow, NLP
Science-Math program with GPA 3.68. Top scores in information and technology subjects.

competitions.title: Changing the way people feel about insurance
competitions.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

competitions.title: Subsea Machine Learning
competitions.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

competitions.title: Student Competition on Triangular Cooperation for Sustainable Development
competitions.description: My team's responsibility is to give a speech to engage students in triangular cooperation for sustainable development from an engineering perspective.

competitions.title: Autonomous Robot Racing
competitions.description: My team's responsibility is coding in the Python language for image processing for autonomous car driving, and I also designed and created a video for presentation.

competitions.title: Health Monitoring and Management Systems for Elderly and All Kinds of People
competitions.description: My team's responsibility is coding the MQTT protocol as a server by using the Javascript language for health monitoring and management systems for the elderly and all kinds of people.

competitions.title: Smart National Historic Site 4.0
competitions.description: My team's responsibility is coding in the Javascript language for the prediction model and connecting to the database. The LINE Beacon was used for counting the number of people who entered the historical park and then intergating as the input to the AI model.

competitions.title: Smart National Park 4.0
competitions.description: My team's responsibility is coding in the MATLAB program to analyze data from sensors and then create AI models. Moreover, I also designed a GUI interface for the user to interact with the system.

competitions.title: Smart City
competitions.description: My team's responsibility is creating the WebApp for the Smart City. The WebApp is used to monitor the number of people who enter and exit the public bus system of the city.

awards.company: 3rd place IARRC Robot Racing Competition, University of Waterloo, Canada.

work.company: The Joint Graduate School of Energy and Environment
work.title: Development LabView Program and Data Logger
work.description: Key Responsibilities: Data collection from NI; creating a data logger to text file; designing and developing a real-time monitoring dashboard.

work.title: Research and Development Software Engineer-Internship
work.description: Major Project: Monitoring the Spring Machine with a WebApp. Key Responsibilities: PLC programming, data collection from PLC via TCP/IP, HTML/CSS, Node.js, MVC. Minor Project: Installation Local Area Network CAT6.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
